Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for tone maps.

bloomBegin.Wiki: The threshold rate for near bloom.

bloomMul.Wiki: The magnification rate for near bloom.

bloomBeginFar.Wiki: The threshold rate for far bloom.

bloomMulFar.Wiki: The magnification rate for far bloom.

bloomNearDist.Wiki: The distance of the bloom. In metres.

bloomFarDist.Wiki: The distance of the bloom. In metres.

grayKeyValue.Wiki: The gray key value. Higher values make the screen brighter, and vice versa.

minAdaptedLum.Wiki: The minimum level of adaptive brightness.

maxAdapredLum.Wiki: The maximum level of adaptive brightness.

adaptSpeed.Wiki: The speed of adaptive brightness changes.

lightShaftBegin.Wiki: The threshold for the light shaft effect.

lightShaftPower.Wiki: The strength of the light shaft effect. 0 means no shaft.

lightShaftAttenRate.Wiki: The attenuation rate of the light shaft. Lower values mean shorter shaft.
